content: what better way to store your plastic bags than inside this fancy fish stuff your grocery bags into his tail and watch his belly grow … remove them through his mouth and watch him shrink back down again length - 61 cm 24 in circumference - 38 cm 15 in notions 4 mm crochet hook us g stitch marker wool needle 2 x 25 mm 1 in buttons beige 2 x 12 mm ½ in buttons blue sewing needle and thread 30 cm 12 in shirring elastic **or** an elastic hair band note if you are interested in adding fins to your project boricuacrochet has very kindly added her instructions to her pattern notes here 1 on ravelry if you use juanita s notes - be sure and leave her a big thank you 1 http //www ravelry com/projects/boricuacrochet/fishie-the-plastic-bag-keeper
